name: Dino vs. Wall
description:
Save Dino from something that the creator of the game doesn't even know what it truly is!

Keep watching what's in the front of you and jump, slide, dodge, or even headbutt them to survive!

Dino vs Wall is an endless-running arcade game that combines the arcade and hole-in-the-wall genre with a little bit of twist and interesting controls.

Control:
Swipe up to jump
Swipe down to slide
Double click to headbutt
Swipe left or right to move between lanes
